hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of time.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Near Dodongos

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Magic Meter# and #a Deku Shield#.
